content: Credit Card OCBC Asked by AnonymousAsked on 23 Apr 2019What is OCBC Duly Signed Form? I applied OCBC Credit Card online and get a call from OCBC that they will send courier to my home to sign the Duly Signed Form? What exactly is this form?1 answerAnswerBump0
Answers (1)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Aik KaiLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 24 Apr 2019It simply means they help you fill out the application form for the credit card and they will send a courier to ask you to sign the "completed" form. They cannot sign on your behalf so they need to send to you to sign off.0 comments1
